Package org.easybatch.core.api

This package contains easy batch core API.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ComputationalRecordProcessor<I,O,R>
    A computational record processor is a processor that performs some computation on input records.
    The result of computation is returned at the end of batch execution.
    Engine
    Interface for the execution engine.
    Record<P>
    Interface for input records.

    A record can be: A line in a flat file A tag in a xml file A row in a database table A file in a directory A message in a queue etc

    RecordFilter
    Interface for record filter.
    RecordMapper<T>
    Interface for record mapper.
    RecordProcessor<I,O>
    Interface for record processor.
    RecordReader
    Interface for record reader.
    RecordValidator<T>
    Interface for record validator.
    TypeConverter<T>
    Interface for type converters that are used to convert raw textual data to typed data in domain objects.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Header
    The record header contains metadata about the record.
    Report
    Class holding batch reporting data.
    ValidationError
    Validation error class.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Status
    Enumeration of engine status.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    RecordMappingException
    Exception thrown when an error occurs during record mapping.
    RecordProcessingException
    Exception thrown when an error occurs during record processing.
    RecordReaderClosingException
    Exception thrown when an error occurs during record reader closing.
    RecordReaderOpeningException
    Exception thrown when an error occurs during record reader opening.
    RecordReadingException
    Exception thrown when an error occurs during record reading.

Package org.easybatch.core.api Description

This package contains easy batch core API.
